results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows: row n lists quadratic nonresidues modulo n.
comment: The length of row n is A095972(n).
link: T. D. Noe, Rows n = 3..100, flattened
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Quadratic Nonresidue
mathematica: (* As a Triangle *) Table[Complement[Range[n - 1], Mod[Range[n/2]^2, n]], {n, 3, 30}] // Column (* _Mo Li_, Sep 01 2019 *)
results.author: _Cino Hilliard_, Jul 21 2004
